metadata.title: CVE-2020-13845 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Sylabs Singularity 3.0 through 3.5 has Improper Validation of an IntegrityCheck Value. Image integrity is not validated when an ECL policy isenforced. The fingerprint required by the ECL is compared against thesignature object descriptor(s) in the SIF file, rather than to acryptographically validated signature.

criterions.comment: singularity-container: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
